Bonobos: New Chinos just dropped! Two new styles, two different vibes, both fit great and look even better. 

Check out our new 5-Pocket Chino 2.0 and The Original Pleated Chino:
https://bonobos.attn.tv/a99oPkeZ9HSa

In the first place

tone: Close journey replies asking customers to text in their birthday to receive a gift
dos_and_don_ts: Offer help if the customer replies back to the automated message with number 0
templates: For checkout issues use COI shortcut
If the site doesn't accept the customers payment method use PME shortcut
promo_and_promo_exclusions: The welcome code can be applied to discounted items
For issues with the code GETSTARTED15 use GSE shortcut
The 20% off welcome offer will automatically be added at checkout for their first order

tone: Don't send long messages, just summarise or send a link
Don't talk about financial situations or opinions about our pricing
Don't reply to journey replies or critiques about the content in the automated messages, close the convo
drive_to_purchase: There is a bundle for bible covers for a collection of hardcover titles

conversation.message_text: LensDirect: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from LensDirect.
LensDirect: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

LensDirect: Welcome. Get 20% off contacts + 25% off eyewear and lens replacement with code F0E9D4846C 

Shop here! lensdirect.attn.tv/avmek5loe0LV
LensDirect: Save our contact for exclusive offers!

LensDirect: Hi, Elaine here! It looks like you left some items in your cart - use 8A344D6A6B to save 20% on contacts and 30% on eyewear and lens replacement!

Text back if you have any questions!
Found the same glasses with same lenses for $300 less elsewhere!!!

LensDirect: Thanks for getting in touch! I'm really sorry to hear about that. Our goal is to always make you happy when it comes to price. So, if you happen to find a lower price on your contact lenses, we'll match it. To get your discount, just call or email us at info@lensdirect.com after you complete your online order, and we'll refund the difference. Include your order number and a link to the lower price. Please note that we won't price match promotions, only on a per box price. Also, we'll only do price matching on reputable retailers such as 1-800CONTACTS.com, VisionDirect.com, Walgreens.com and Coastal.com.
Contact lenses? I said glasses.
LensDirect: I'm sorry for the confusion! I'm afraid that we only price match contact lenses at this time.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for post purchase issues, use PPI shortcut
templates: For medical inquiries about contacts or lens replacement use MQ shortcut
